### Financial Services Tender Announcement
#### Overview
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is inviting bids for a tender to provide financial services for the Industry Relations and Innovation Programs Division (IRIPD) Suite of Canadian Forest Economy Programs. The successful contractor will be required to provide a range of services including economic or financial evaluation of projects, financial accounting, and audit services.

#### Tender Details
| Dimension | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | NRCan-5000076454 |
| Tender Closing Date | 05 Jan 2024 14:00:00 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 02 Jan 2024 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 31 Mar 2026 |

#### Tender Method
The contract will be awarded through a competitive selective tendering process. Suppliers will be evaluated based on their combined rating for technical merit and price, with the highest-scoring bidder being selected.

#### Regions of Opportunity
The contract is open to Canadian firms and will be delivered entirely within Canada.

#### Regions of Delivery
The contract will be delivered across Canada.

#### Contact

(343) 541-7931
